text: The president of the Government of Catalonia (, ) is one of the main parts of government that make up the Statute of Autonomy of Catalonia. The president also is head of government of Catalonia. The current acting president is Salvador Illa since 8 August 2024. ==Presidents (since 1977)== Portrait Name Term of office Party Government Election Monarch Josep Tarradellas 1977 1980 ERC Tarradellas Juan Carlos I Jordi Pujol 1980 1984 CDC Pujol I 1980 1984 1988 Pujol II 1984 1988 1992 Pujol III 1988 1992 1995 Pujol IV 1992 1995 1999 Pujol V 1995 1999 2003 Pujol VI 1999 Pasqual Maragall 2003 2006 PSC Maragall 2003 Jos√© Montilla 2006 2010 PSC Montilla 2006 Artur Mas 2010 2012 CDC Mas I 2010 2012 2016 Mas II 2012 Felipe VI Carles Puigdemont 2016 2017 CDC Puigdemont 2015 PDeCAT Direct rule over Catalonia Quim Torra 2018 2020 Independent Torra 2017 ==References==
title: President of the Government of Catalonia
